content: The Mother of Stones is an optional Yaoguai Chief miniboss that you can encounter in Chapter 2 of Black Myth Wukong. As an optional foe, you can seek out this boss as part of the Man-in-Stone's Quest, and gain the ability to turn into a Rock Guai yourself by defeating her.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mother_of_Stones.md', within the main section titled 'Mother of Stones'.
The content is as follows:
The Mother of Stones is an optional Yaoguai Chief miniboss that you can encounter in Chapter 2 of Black Myth Wukong. As an optional foe, you can seek out this boss as part of the Man-in-Stone's Quest, and gain the ability to turn into a Rock Guai yourself by defeating her.
